content: My only question is: only 10 minutes? Can your really get pleasure from only ten minutes a day? I just realized that sounds unnecessarily naughty, and I suppose that if you do so much required reading 10 minutes can indeed be glorious, but I am used to reading for pleasure in long stretches of at the very least half and hour, most of the time one hour or more. Being snapped out of my immersion in a story after 10 minutes every day sounds like torture to me…
